com.example.alarvet.seguin_larvet_androidproject

Class Convolution

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.alarvet.seguin_larvet_androidproject.Filter
      • com.example.alarvet.seguin_larvet_androidproject.Convolution

  • public class Convolution
extends Filter
    This class applies convolutions to the bitmap.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.example.alarvet.seguin_larvet_androidproject.Filter

        height, width

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Convolution(android.graphics.Bitmap bmp) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void averageBlurring(int radius)
      This method applies an average blurring effect by using the Summed area table technique.
      void contouring()
      This method applies a contouring filter : if two close pixels are very different, it will be shown on the bitmap with a lighter gray, otherwise it will be shown on the bitmap with a darker gray.
      void convolution(int[] matrixConvo)
      This method applies a convolution.
      int[] convolutionMatrix(int cases, int dimension)
      This method create the matrix of convolution needed according to the case called.
      void laplacien()
      This method applies a Laplacien filter.

    • Method Detail

      • summedAreaTable

        public java.lang.Object[] summedAreaTable(int[] initialTable)

      • averageBlurring

        public void averageBlurring(int radius)
        This method applies an average blurring effect by using the Summed area table technique.
        Parameters:
        radius - radius of effect of the blur

      • laplacien

        public void laplacien()
        This method applies a Laplacien filter.

      • convolutionMatrix

        public int[] convolutionMatrix(int cases,
                               int dimension)
        This method create the matrix of convolution needed according to the case called.
        Parameters:
        cases - case called : 1 = AverageBlur 2 = GaussianBlur 0/3 = Contouring(horizontally/vertically) 4 = Sharpening
        dimension - dimension of the matrix to return.
        Returns:
        the convolution matrix

      • convolution

        public void convolution(int[] matrixConvo)
        This method applies a convolution.
        Parameters:
        matrixConvo - the matrix to apply

      • contouring

        public void contouring()
        This method applies a contouring filter : if two close pixels are very different, it will be shown on the bitmap with a lighter gray, otherwise it will be shown on the bitmap with a darker gray.
